heading: Section 6: NORMAL NAME
subheading: Kojima’s early work includes lots of characters that have names that are widely considered to be “normal.” Was this just because, in the early years, he didn’t have the power to say, “I’m Hideo Kojima, I can name someone Die­Hardman if I want to” without people questioning him? Probably.
